title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.17 - Unapproved buildings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4622.17 - Unapproved buildings

State Regulations

No games of chance shall be held in any building that has
not been approved by the municipal governing body for public assembly, or as
otherwise required by law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4622.17

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
